description:
As the Davy Back Fight sprints toward a sensational finish, the Straw Hats find themselves on the brink of defeat! Luffy`s finally managed to stay on his skates, but the Foxy Pirates are notorious cheaters!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Seriously Heated Race! Into the Final Round!
Hakunetsu Bakusou Race! Saishuu Round Totsunyuu!
Il round roller alle battute finali
Une fin de course explosive ! En route pour le dernier round !
Раскалённая гонка! Зажигание. Пробиваясь в финал
การแข่งขันอันเร่าร้อน! เข้าสู่รอบสุดท้าย!
白熱爆走レース! 最終ラウンド突入!
